titleStmt.title: An elegy upon the death of Mr. William Lilly the astrologer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Obadiah Blagrave, at the Bear in St. Pauls Church-yard, near the little North Door,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "OUR Prophet's gone: no longer may our Ears ..."
Within mourning border, with emblems and motto at head.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Bear in St. Pauls Church-yard, near the little North Door
